0.name: A Path Into The Forest
desc: "   The path is narrow and does not look to inviting, there is a small sign
here, maybe you should read it.  The path leads into a ancient forest.
You can only see the first row of trees from here and they are huge.  Was
that a howl.....hrmm maybe you should turn back now while you still can.
The only obvious exits are back to the graveyard and the south leads further
into the forest.
"   Beware this forest if for the stoutest of adventurers only,
other may find themselves wishing the had not entered.

1.name: A Path Into The Forest
desc: "  The path is narrow and has roots from the trees standing out almost like
they are grabing at you tring to trip you.  The forest just seems to get
darker as you go, you can barely make out the path to the south.  Was that
something moving in the forest.  The obvious exits are back to the path to
the north and south leads further into the forest.

2.name: A Path Into The Forest
desc: "  The path is narrow and has roots from the trees standing out almost like
they are grabing at you tring to trip you.  The forest just seems to get
darker as you go, you can barely make out the path to the south.  Was that
something moving in the forest.  The obvious exits are back to the path to
the north and south leads further into the forest.

3.name: A Path Into The Forest
desc: "   The path is narrow and has roots from the trees standing out almost like
they are grabing at you trying to trip you.  The forest just seems to get
darker as you go, you can barely make out the path to the south.  Was that
something moving in the forest.  The obvious exits are back to the path to
the north and south leads further into the forest.

4.name: A Path Into The Forest
desc: "   The path leads right into the forest to east you can barely make out the
path to the east.  The path has gotten even narrower here you are barely
able to avoid some of the branches that have grown at odd angles.  Almost as
if the are growing to block the path.  The path leads back to the north and
to the the east an overgrown track seems to lead towards an abandoned house.

5.name: In The Ancient forest
desc: "   The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The trail leads back to the east
and west leads further into the forest.

6.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "   The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The trail leads back to the east
and west leads further into the forest.

7.name: A Split In The Trail
desc: "   The trail splits here it goes north and south.  To the north you can see
some light a little bit away, maybe you should head that way cause to the
south is the forest and you can barely make anything out except the noises
of something moving stealthly through the woods.  The trail leads back to
the east, north and south.

8.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "   The trail has gotten a bit lighter and the tree roots have receded a bit
so now it actually looks like a path leading north.  To the north it looks
like there forest is thining out some.  The path leads to the north and back
to the darker forest to the south.

9.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "   The trail has gotten a bit lighter and the tree roots have receded a bit
so now it actually looks like a path leading north.  To the north it looks
like there forest is thining out some.  The path leads to the north and back
to the darker forest to the south.

10.name: In A Clearing
desc: "   Coming out of the forest the clearing is almost blinding even with the cloud
cover.  You can hear the sounds of civilation coming from behind the huge gates
to the west it would appear there is some kind of village in that direction.
The obvious exits are back to the south which leads back to the forest and to
the east towards the gates.

12.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "   The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The trail leads back to the north
and south leads further into the forest.

13.name: The River Bed
desc: "   The trail has lead you to a river bed, the river bed is dry and looks like
it has been for awhile.  Off to both sides it looks like something has dug
out small little caves.  Off to the east and west are the caves and the trail
leads back to the north and south.

14.name: The River Bed
desc: "   The trail has lead you to a river bed, the river bed is dry and looks like
it has been for awhile.  Off to both sides it looks like something has dug
out small little caves.  Off to the east and west are the caves and the trail
leads back to the north and south.

15.name: The River Bed
desc: "   The trail has lead you to a river bed, the river bed is dry and looks like
it has been for awhile.  Off to both sides it looks like something has dug
out small little caves.  Off to the east and west are the caves and the trail
leads back to the north and south.

16.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "   The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The trail leads back to the river
bed to the north and west, south leads further into the forest.

17.name: In A Small Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked alot smaller from the outside once getting past the small
entrance it is actually quite spacious although the smell leaves a lot to be
desired.  Someone or something has definetly made this there home.  The only
obvious exits is back east to the river bed.

18.name: In A Small Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked a lot smaller from the outside once getting past the small
entrance it is actually quite spacious although the smell leaves a lot to be
desired.  Someone or something has definetly made this there home.  The only
obvious exits is back east to the river bed.

19.name: In A Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked a lot smaller from the outside once getting past the small

desc: "  The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The path has thinned out here it
looks like only animals has made it.  The path leads of in several directions.

49.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "  The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The path has thinned out here it
looks like only animals has made it.  The path leads of in several directions.

50.name: A Small Clearing
desc: "  The path has lead you into a small clearing.  The clearing would be quite
nice if not for all the bones crunching under your feet.  Obviously someone
or something very nasty calls this clearing home, judging by all the bones
maybe you should head back to the forest.  The path back to the north is the
only obvious exit.

51.name: A Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked a lot smaller from the outside once getting past the small
entrance it is actually quite spacious although the smell leaves a lot to be
desired.  Someone or something has definetly made this there home.  The only
obvious exits is back west to the river bed.

52.name: A Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked a lot smaller from the outside once getting past the small
entrance it is actually quite spacious although the smell leaves a lot to be
desired.  Someone or something has definetly made this there home.  The only
obvious exits is back west to the river bed.

53.name: A Earthen Cave
desc: "   The cave looked a lot smaller from the outside once getting past the small
entrance it is actually quite spacious although the smell leaves a lot to be
desired.  Someone or something has definetly made this there home.  The only
obvious exits is back east to the river bed.

54.name: In The Ancient Forest
desc: "  The forest has none of the usual noises you found in a forest of this size
no birds singing nothing of the sort.  Only the sounds of something large
moving around just out of sight.  This something sounds rather hungry if the
howls off in the distance can be any judge.  The path has thinned out here it
looks like only animals has made it.  The path leads of in several directions.

55.name: A Small Clearing
desc: "  The path has lead you into a small clearing.  The clearing would be quite
nice if not for all the bones crunching under your feet.  Obviously someone
or something very nasty calls this clearing home, judging by all the bones
maybe you should head back to the forest.  The path back to the north is the
only obvious exit.

57.name: A Path Leading To A Small Village
desc: "   The path from the clearing appears to lead to a small village, The village
appears to be occupied you can see smoke coming from the chimneys of some of
the larger buildings.  The path leads west which is into the village and back
east to the clearing.

58.name: Entrance To The Village
desc: "    The dining hall has an ancient looking bar it would some only the bravest
of adventurers or the must desperate would order a drink from here.  The
room is rather large with tables and chairs that at one time were rather
nice, now though they have seen years of neglect.  The door leads back
out to the road.

59.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it definetly looks like times have changed.

60.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it defintly looks like times have changed.

61.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it definetly looks like times have changed.

62.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it definetly looks like times have changed.

63.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it definetly looks like times have changed.

64.name: In A Small Village
desc: "   There are buildings on each side of the road the buildings appear to be two
story houses.  The houses and the village for that matter seem to have been
here for quite awhile.  It would seem that the village at some point in time
was very prosperous. Now it definetly looks like times have changed.

65.name: A large Dining Area
desc: "    The dining hall has an ancient looking bar it would some only the
bravest of adventurers or the must desperate would order a drink from
here.  The room is rather large with tables and chairs that at one time
were rather nice, now though they have seen years of neglect.  The door
leads back out to the road.

66.name: A Large Kitchen
desc: "   The kitchen appears to be well used no of the neglect shows here as in the
dining hall, it is well maintained and smells of breads and some kind of
delcious stew.  The is a door you would assume it leads down to the cellar you
also go back to the north to the dining hall.

67.name: The Cellar
desc: "   The cellar is lined with casks of ales along both walls, if nothing else
the villagers have a nice stock of ales.  Among the ales the are various
things of spices and what appear to at least at one time to have been
vegtables.  The only obvious exit is back up through the door.

68.name: The Inn Of The Silver Shield
desc: "   The inn has some worn couches and chairs in the reception area but has been
meticuslously cleaned not a sight of dirt or grime anywhere.  This looks like
it would be a halfway safe place to spend the night. The only obvious exit is
back to the road.

69.name: A Small Cottage
desc: "   As you look around you notice that the cottage has been heavily fortified
from intrusion from the road if the owner did not want you in it looks like
even the most desperate adventurer would have a problem. The only obvious
exit is back to the road.

70.name: Mayor's Office
desc: "  The office appears to be a bit unorganized, papers seems to have
overtaken The small desk here. It would appear that the mayor
could definitely use a secretary. Besides the mountains of paper
the only other thing of note is a large ornate mirror which seems
to be out of place here. The only obvious exit is back to the road.

exits.info: door, closed, locked, pickproof, hidden, autoclose, autolock

71.name: In The Mirror
desc: "   You seem to be standing in darkness itself all is calm nothing can be heard
or seen you doubt if you could see your hand before your face in here.  There
are no obvious exits.

extra.desc: BE WARNED....You travel to a place few return from.

72.name: A Small Home
desc: "  The home looks little more then a work place for some kind of hunter.
There are various animal pelts stack neatly on shelves all around the
room. The only obvious exit is back to the road.

73.name: A Large Cave
desc: "  The Cave walls glow dimly with almost an unwordly light, vaguely human
shape shadows seem to bloom from the glow. There seems to be stairs out
in the middle of the cave. The stairs seem to be the only way out.

74.name: A Spiral Staircase
desc: "  The stairs have been cut right into the rock that forms the cave above.
The stairs have been expertly crafted whoever made them either put a lot
of work into them or paid someone handsomely for the job. The stairs
continue down and lead back up to the cave.

75.name: Bottom Of The Staircase
desc: "  The stairs have lead you to a tunnel entrance. The tunnel entrance has
runes inscribed all around it and give off a slight blue glow.  On The
wall by the entrance there seems to contain a small plaque.  The obvious
exits are back up and the tunnel entrance.
In Are arrogance we thought we could contain them..
But it would appear we have failed...
Venturing further is strongly discouraged for most
is not all will meet there demise from what lays beyond.

76.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  The tunnel
has a sturdy oak door to the south and continues to the east.

78.name: A Large Room
desc: "   The room is covered in floor to ceiling shelves, everywhere you look
is shelves and they all seem to be covered with some rather gruesome things
in jars.  In the middle of the room is what appears to be a large work table.
You can go back out to the tunnel or there is a small door to the south.

79.name: A Small Room
desc: "   The room is nothing more then a small entrance to the cave to the south
which appears to be small cell.  The are torch set in the wall which give
off a strange blue glow.  The only obvious exits are through the door, or
the cell door to the south.

80.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  The tunnel
continues to the east and goes back to the west.

81.name: A Turn In The Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  The tunnel
continues to the south and goes back to the west.

82.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are placed every so often along the walls.  There is A
ornate door to the south.  The tunnel continues to the east and back to
the north.

83.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  There is A
ornate door to the south.  The tunnel continues to the east and back to
the west.

84.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  There is A
ornate door to the south.  The tunnel continues to the east and back to
the west.

85.name: A Long Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  There is A
ornate door to the south.  The tunnel continues to the east and back to
the west.

86.name: A Ornate Bedroom
desc: "  The bedroom walls have exquiste statues carved right into the rock of the
walls.  All the furniture in the room appears to have taken years to carve it
it is so ornate. Whom ever lives here must either have had a lot of time here
or is very rich.  The only obvious exit is back to the north.

87.name: A Ornate Bedroom
desc: "  The bedroom walls have exquiste statues carved right into the rock of the
walls.  All the furniture in the room appears to have taken years to carve it
it so ornate. Whom ever leaves here must either have had a lot of time here is
very rich.  The only obvious exit is back to the north.

88.name: A Ornate Bedroom
desc: "  The bedroom walls have exquiste statues carved right into the rock of the
walls.  All the furniture in the room appears to have taken years to carve it
it so ornate. Whom ever leaves here must either have had a lot of time here is
very rich.  The only obvious exit is back to the north.

89.name: A Dueling Room
desc: "   The walls are lined with weapons racks holding various lethal weapons.
Whom ever uses this room they obviously come to draw blood or kill there
oppenent, because there are no padded weapons here. The only obvious exit is
back to the north.

90.name: A Small Room
desc: "   The Room is small but you get a feeling of peacefulness as you enter.
As you look around you see small lamps upon the walls and a bed.  The small
altar in the middle of the room is the only thing of note here.  The only
obvious exit is back to the north.

91.name: A Turn In The Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel walls are smooth and polished which reflects the light from
the lanterns that are place every so often along the walls.  The tunnel
continues to the south and north or you can go back to the west.

92.name: A Larger Tunnel
desc: "   The tunnel has become rather larger and it seems to continue to become
larger to the east. Just looking to the east the vastness or maybe just
something to the east gives you a feeling you should turn back now.  The
tunnel continues to the east.

93.name: A Large Cave
desc: "   The cave is huge even with all the lanterns in the walls you can not
make out the ceiling of it.  The cave has runes running all along the walls
which give off a faint blue glow.  The only obvious exits is back the way
you came.

extra.desc: The whole cave glows blue for an instant.....

94.name: The Room Of The Dead
desc: "   The walls strange glow give off just enough light to make out the huge
chair in the center of the room.  The chair looks to be made entirely of
human skulls.  The only obvious exit is to the north.

95.name: A Small Cave
desc: "   Although smaller this cave also has runes all around the walls.  Although
the runes in this room seem to be almost archaic compared to the ones in the
last room. The only obvious exit is back to the south.

96.name: Before The Arch
desc: "   The Tunnel has come to a end here.  You stand before A large arch, the
arch appears to be almost natural.  The arch has a large gate across it.
Through the gate the cave beyond glows brightly.  The tunnel leads back
to the south and you can go through the arch to the north.

97.name: A Large Cave
desc: "   The cave is huge, it has be set up as a large study.  There are various
tomes and books lining the walls and stacked upon the various desks
that are sit up around the cave.  The only obvious exit is back to the
south.

98.name: A Small Cell
desc: "   The room is small and consist of a lantern on the wall and a small bed
next to the wall.  The only obvious exit is back to the north.
